rs.

Pn)
2016/KER/60
B. KEMAL PASHA, J.
ee ee ae
ORDER
Petitioner is the defacto complainant. His complaint is
that the investigating officer has not arraigned two other
persons who were involved in the incident, as accused in
the case. When final report has been filed and the same
has been accepted by the court below, it is open to the
petitioner to approach the court below with a petition under
Section 173(8) CrPC. seeking a further investigation in the
matter. In such a case, the court below shall pass
appropriate orders in accordance with law. In case the
application is not entertained, it is open to the petitioner to
approach this Court again. With such a liberty, this Crl.M.C.
is disposed of.
Sd/- B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE
ul/-
[True copy] PS. to Judge
